title: Could China Be a Partner in A.I. Evolution?
description: Responses to a column by Thomas L. Friedman about cooperation between the U.S. and China on artificial intelligence. Also: A beautiful sight in Nashville.
content:
To the Editor:
Re “Why the U.S. and China Should Collaborate, Not Compete, on A.I.,” by Thomas L. Friedman (column, Sept. 7):
Mr. Friedman sounds an important alarm about the risks of unregulated artificial intelligence. However, I must respectfully ... [1197 chars]

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Strategic Moves by AI Engineering Services to Overhaul India's MRO Sector
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.
content: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment ... [502 chars]

title: Artificial intelligence is the new Iron Man suit, says Publicis Sapient CEO Nigel Vaz
description: Vaz cited analogies like Iron Man and Jarvis to illustrate how combining human capability with advanced technology can create a powerful, transformative superhero-type synergy in AI adoption
content:
Publicis Sapient CEO Nigel Vaz likens Artificial Intelligence to Iron Man’s high-tech armour, emphasising that when AI combines with human skills, it unlocks extraordinary abilities far greater than what either can achieve on their own.
In an intervi... [3766 chars]

title: Par Panel Urges Govt To Develop Legal, Tech Solutions To Act Against Those Behind AI-Based Fake News
description: NEW DELHI, Sept 14:  A parliamentary committee has asked the Government to develop concrete legal and technological solutions for identifying and prosecuting individuals and entities responsible for spreading Artificial Intelligence-generated fake news.   The Standing Committee on Communications and Information Technology, in its draft report, called for a balanced approach for deploying AI to curb fake news, noting that the technology is being used to detect misinformation but can be a source of misinformation as well. The draft report of […]
content:

title: Hiring in India’s IT industry sees a 2-3% dip due to AI, economic uncertainties
description: Artificial intelligence, economic uncertainties, and Trump’s tariffs, among other factors, have contributed to a 2–3 percent decline in India’s IT industry, with six major firms, including TCS and Infosys, hiring only 3,800 employees this quarter.
content: IT companies in India appear to be slowing down hiring as they increasingly invest in artificial intelligence, which is seen as the future of technology. This trend is expected to persist in the near term. Many are attributing this decline, which is ... [2213 chars]

title: Parliament panel urges govt to develop legal, tech solutions to act against those behind AI-based fake news
description: A parliamentary panel urges the government to create laws and tech to fight fake news made by Artificial Intelligence. The committee wants ministries to work together. They suggest licensing AI content creators and labeling AI content. The panel sees fake news as a threat. It wants stricter rules and fines. Media groups should have fact-checking and ombudsman, says the committee.
content:
Synopsis
A parliamentary panel urges the government to create laws and tech to fight fake news made by Artificial Intelligence. The committee wants ministries to work together. They suggest licensing AI content creators and labeling AI content. The p... [4030 chars]

title: OpenAI Partners With ARISE To Empower Indian Educators With AI Tools
description: The Masterclass, delivered by OpenAI, offered practical demonstrations of how artificial intelligence can support teachers in lesson planning, improve student engagement, and personalize learning experiences. It highlighted the potential of AI not as a replacement for educators, but as a powerful ally in strengthening the teacher-learner relationship.
content:
New Delhi: Artificial Intelligence giant OpenAI, the company behind ChatGPT, has collaborated with the Association for Reinventing School Education (ARISE) to bring advanced artificial intelligence tools and training to K-12 educators across India.
A... [2778 chars]

title: Spotted: ChatGPT comes to India
description: Last month, artificial intelligence’s hottest name OpenAI began posting job openings in India and announced it will run an office in New Delhi. Now, it has discreetly launched an outdoor campaign with ads showcasing all that ChatGPT can do.
content: So, it was surprising to see this week a discreet-looking analogue ad for ChatGPT, the app probably most synonymous with all the wonders of generative AI, sitting on one billboard in the corner next to Juhu Circle bus stand. This ad campaign, and oth... [1299 chars]
